item.title: Webscraping Thousands of Used Cars
item.description: In another post, I describe how I use this data that Iâ€™ve scraped, but I wanted to provide a more in-depth tutorial for those interested in how I got the data. Note, this data belongs to Truecar, so all uses herein are for personal and academic reasons only. Get the data In order to do any good analaysis, you first need data. I prefer to have more data than less, where possible.
